short_summary: Corporate Services Sector requires the assistance of up to 3 Senior Leadership Development Consultants.
description: The Corporate Services Sector requires the assistance of up to 3 Senior Leadership Development Consultants, under TSPS 1.7 Leadership Development Consultant, to provide executive coaching services to CSS executive directors on an as-needed basis.
tags: World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
full_summary:
# 24062-24-298 TSPS 1.7 Leadership and Development Consultants

### Tenders Status

This **Competitive Selective Tendering (CST)** for TSPS 1.7 Leadership and Development Consultants has been **Cancelled**.

### Tender Details

*   **Tender Reference:** CB-703-43269566
*   **Tender Solicitation Number:** 24062-24-298
*   **Publication Date:** March 5th, 2024
*   **Tender Closing Date:** March 20th, 2024, 14:00:00
*   **Expected Contract Start Date:** April 8th, 2024
*   **Expected Contract End Date:** March 31st, 2027
*   **Total Contract Value:** $[Contract Amount]
*   **Work Locations:** National Capital Region (NCR), Canada
*   **Contracting Entity:** Treasury Board of Canada Secretariat
*   **End User Entities:** Not applicable
*   **Trade Agreements:** The award of this contract is subject to Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement, World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA), North American Free Trade Agreement (NAFTA), Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA), Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP), Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA), Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA), and other regional agreements.

### Contact Details

If you would like to obtain further information, please contact:

*   **Contact Person:** Richard Boyling
*   **Email:** [richard.boyling@tbs-sct.gc.ca](mailto:richard.boyling@tbs-sct.gc.ca)
*   **Phone:** 343-542-9916

### Documents

More information can be found in the tender package, available at [tender package link here](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/33505/24-298-npp-english.pdf) and [French version link here](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/33505/24-298-npp-french.pdf).

Note that this tender package is available for review online. [Please Click Here to View](https://canadabuys.canada.ca.)
